description:
Before anyone had realized it, a neighborhood cat named Nora started to hang out in the house shared by the members of KNoCC. Nora seemed to be living according to his own whims, but one day Esola points out that the cat has a habit of snuggling up to Chrom. Puzzled by this phenomenon, Chrom decides to investigate how Nora really spends his time.
Source: crunchyroll
